thread.title: Parents can now add numbers to all-call system (Newark City School District)
thread.title_full: Parents can now add numbers to all-call system (Newark City School District) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Parents can now add numbers to all-call system (Newark City School District)
text: ( Source : Newark City School District ) Newark City Schools moved to the SchoolMessenger system for district and school all-call messages this year. The system is already set up to call the phone number families register with their child's
